description: Improper handling of writes to virtual GICR control can lead to assertion failure in the hypervisor in Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Compute, Snapdragon Mobile

product.name: Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Compute, Snapdragon Mobile
